benefits.title: We’re with you every step of the way
benefits.text1: Rapid Router is aligned to the UK Computing Curriculum, so you can gain the knowledge and confidence you need.
benefits.text2: The step-by-step nature of Rapid Router makes it simple for you and your students to gain exerience quickly.
benefits.text3: Easy to use teacher dashboard includes scores to track student progress as well as comprehensive teaching resources.
